annonsrubrik: Want to be a part of the future in Product Development IT?
annonstext:
Scania is currently undergoing an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions. IT is a crucial part of this transformation as Scania’s success is depending on flexible and efficient IT solutions that support current and future business requirements.

At Product Development IT, we are responsible for the design, development, implementation and maintenance of IT solutions for R&D. The work environment is international and our employees are representing many different nationalities and countries. To this exciting and dynamic environment we are now looking for new IT-professionals, irrespective of where you live within Sweden.

If you are a Full-Stack Java Developer using Agile and DevOps engineering practices, then maybe this could be the right challenge for you.

Your responsibilities

Scania has always believed in delivering sustainable Transport Solutions and our team at Scania IT make sure we are part of this journey by becoming digital partners to the Scania R&D. Part of this transformation journey is to migrate applications onto Cloud, bring secure and effective solutions with high availability while continuously integrating the new releases with zero downtimes.

You will be part of a development team where you will be working with a focus on development deliverables, system requirements, testing, support and release management.

You will be working as a full-stack Java developer using Agile and DevOps engineering practices. You will play an important role in building our new applications and migrating our existing applications to AWS. You will ensure that our solutions are built with good software architecture and will continuously improve the way of working.

You’ll have tons of opportunities to expand your skills and apply those skills to interesting new problems. We are very excited about the DevOps space and eager to apply these principles and tools to deliver better software. In this growing and emerging field staying up to speed and learning new tools is part of the job.

Your Profile:

• A 7-10 years of experienced IT professional with academic degree, used to work independent as well as in teams.
• Minimum 5+ years of experience working as a full stack developer – knowledge in Core Java, Spring, Angular and JavaScript.
• Proven experience as a cloud developer(preferably AWS) using Agile and DevOps engineering practices
• Experience in building and designing APIs' based on Clean Architecture Principles using RESTful services, desirable GraphQL, APIM, Kafka.
• Passionate about test-driven development, clean code and continuous deployment and delivery
• Experience working with CI/CD tools to build and deploy applications with GitLab/Jenkins etc.
• Working or have worked with software engineering, programming, change management, integrations, product development or system architecture & design
• Good to have, experience working with scripting (bash/python).
• Open-minded and willing to explore new methods and ways of working
• A curious person with focus on business needs and understand the big picture
• Motivated, team player with excellent communication skills and passion to share knowledge

Our development culture

We are a medium-sized team that moves fast and iterates. We run code reviews, testing, and are currently working on achieving a continuous deployment infrastructure on Amazon Cloud. We put a lot of emphasis on code style, cleanliness and robustness. You will get to work with excellent engineers and you’ll have the opportunity to make a real impact on our way of working, vision and IT targets.

You will get to work with the latest technologies out there and continuously improve our processes and deliverables. We will never limit your creativity, never shut down ideas before testing them with customers and we will never be boring!

We embrace distributed development as a core tenant of our corporate philosophy. When a project requires collaboration we use shared workspaces, screen sharing, and voice over the internet to enable real-time discussions.

If this sounds like a team you’d love to be a part of building, and you’ve got the skill set, please get in touch with us. We’d love to hear from you!

For more information 

Please contact Gunpreet Kaur (Manager),  TELEPHONENO 0 or Enrico Richiello (Scania IT Recruiter), +46  TELEPHONENO Application 
Your application should include a resume and a cover letter. Selections will be made throughout the application period. 
Please apply as soon as possible. Job ID 20211375
